item.title: I tried to find the optimal route of the dream land by (quantum) annealing
item.description: ## Introduction Land of dreams… Yes, that is Tokyo Disneyland, known as the Kingdom of Dreams and Magic. I’m sure you’ve visited once, but it’s quite crowded on holidays. In such a case, waiting time and traveling distance are the burdens in dreamland. It would be ideal if there was a course where the waiting time and travel distance would be shortened. However, when it comes to thinking for yourself, it is necessary to accurately grasp the positions and waiting times of the enormous attractions.
